data.title: Rodrigues islands april Weather 2025: Forecast and temperature city by city
data.meta_description: Is the climate on the island of Rodrigues  in april good? Discover the weather forecast in april 2025 to prepare your trip.

Rodrigues islands in april: average Weather, Temperature and Climate, Where to go?

Best time to go to Rodrigues Island

Weather on the island of Rodrigues in april 2025

Below, you have access to the weather forecast for the month of april for most popular cities in Rodrigues islands. These forecasts are probabilities for april from weather reports for over 10 years. The percentage indicates the probability of having the weather indicated.

Where to go on the island of Rodrigues in april?

Where to go on the island of Rodrigues in april: destination map

Where should you go on the island of Rodrigues in april when it comes to the weather?

Remember:

The climate on the island of Rodrigues in april is good across the board.

You are lucky: It is not perfect, however, the weather in Rodrigues islands in april is, according to seasonal norms, good averywhere: in Petite butte, Baie aux Huîtres, Port-Mathurin, Petit Gabriel, Port Sud-Est and Mont Lubin. I allows to appreciate vacation everywhere. And even why not take a little time to sunbathe!

Climate on the island of Rodrigues in april

Climate in Port-Mathurin in april

In april, the mean temperature in Port-Mathurin is 27°C (maximum temperature is 28°C and minimum temperature is 27°C). The climate comfortable in this city in the month of april. With 107mm over 5 days, you risk getting wet slightly throughout your holidays. But this is moderate and it will not be continuous.

With a good weather, april is a good time to go in Port-Mathurin in Rodrigues islands.

Weather data for Rodrigues islands in april:

Weather data for Rodrigues islands in april is derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 on the island of Rodrigues. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather on the island of Rodrigues can vary slightly from year to year, but these predictions should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags and check when is the best time to go to Rodrigues Island.
